title: Stack Overflow Clone Welcome Tour
description: Introduces new users to the Stack Overflow clone platform features

steps.content: Welcome to AutoBot - our Stack Overflow clone! This is the main navigation header where you can access different sections of the platform.
The sidebar contains quick navigation links to important sections like Home, Questions, Tags, and Users.
Use this 'Ask Question' button to post new questions to the community. It's the primary way to get help!
These tabs help you filter questions by different criteria like 'Interesting', 'Hot', or by time periods.
Here you'll find all the questions posted by the community. Each question shows votes, answers, and views.

title: How to Ask a Question
description: Step-by-step guide for asking effective questions

steps.content: Start with a clear, descriptive title that summarizes your problem in one line.
Provide detailed information about your problem. Include code examples, error messages, and what you've tried.
Add relevant tags to help others find and categorize your question. Use specific technology names.
Review your question and click submit when you're ready to post it to the community.

title: User Interaction Features
description: Showcases voting, commenting, and other interactive features

steps.content: This shows the vote score for each question. Higher scores indicate more useful questions.
The answer count shows how many people have responded to this question.
View count indicates how many times this question has been viewed by users.
Tags help categorize questions and make them easier to find for people with expertise in specific areas.

title: Search and Filter Questions
description: Learn how to find specific questions using search and filters

steps.content: Use the search bar to find questions related to specific topics or technologies.
Use these filter tabs to sort questions by different criteria like popularity or recency.
Navigate through multiple pages of questions using the pagination controls at the bottom.
